nodes.documentation:
Check if address is a valid destination to transfer tokens to
- must not be zero address
- must not be the token address
- must not be the sender's address
nodes.name: validSigner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "unable to withdraw at the moment"

arguments.value: unable to withdraw at the moment

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "unable to withdraw at the moment"

nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation:
To allow deposited NTF participate joining in as sealer. 
Participate already must deposit enough NTF via Deposit function. 
It takes signer as parameter.
@param _signer Destination address
nodes.name: join

nodes.documentation: Request to exit out of activation sealer set
nodes.name: leave

nodes.documentation: To withdraw sealers NTF balance when they already exited and after withdrawal period.
nodes.name: withdraw

deposit(uint256).notice: Transfer the NTF from token holder to registration contract.  Sealer might have to approve contract to transfer an amount of NTF before calling this function.

join(address).notice: To allow deposited NTF participate joining in as sealer.  Participate already must deposit enough NTF via Deposit function.  It takes signer as parameter.

leave().notice: Request to exit out of activation sealer set

withdraw().notice: To withdraw sealers NTF balance when they already exited and after withdrawal period.
